question: Which of the following is a characteristic of SOAP?
answers: It can be used only with HTTP

it: Quale delle seguenti è una caratteristica dello SOAP?
Può essere usato solo con HTTP

question: Identify the missing element in this WSDL snippet.
code:
<definitions name="StockQuote" targetNamespace="http://www.example.org/stock" xmlns="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/" xmlns:soap="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/soap/">
  <types>
    <xsd:schema targetNamespace="http://www.example.org/stock">
      <xsd:element name="GetPriceRequest">
        <xsd:complexType>
          <xsd:all>
            <xsd:element name="StockName" type="xsd:string"/>
          </xsd:all>
        </xsd:complexType>
      </xsd:element>
    </xsd:schema>
  </types>
  <portType name="StockQuotePortType">
    <operation name="GetPrice">
      <input message="tns:GetPriceRequest"/>
      <output message="tns:GetPriceResponse"/>
    </operation>
  </portType>
</definitions>

it: Identifica l'elemento mancante in questo frammento WSDL.
